title: Ranked Game crashes and takes 10 minutes to restart ?!
body:
Hey guys,

I was just in ranked game when the game decided again to disconnect. my connection was fine, still my game didnt reconnect. So I started the launcher again and he now scans just 2 files per second so patching takes a very long time. 
Also my game crashes every time I leave champ select. I have to restart the whole client then to be able to reconnect. 2 mins after game started - gg.
Also just got LeaverBuster because you failed your job. This is just destroying any fun I had in the game.
PLEASE PLEASE GET YOUR SHIT DONE FFS OR TURN DOWN THE SERVERS!
